# Kyiv Table Tennis Guide

> Community resource for table tennis players in Kyiv, Ukraine. Lists clubs, outdoor courts, and weekly competition schedules.

Website: https://tabletennis.kyiv.ua/
Languages: Ukrainian (index.html), English (index_en.html)

## Content Stability

Stable (changes rarely):
- Club listings: names, addresses, phone numbers, amenities, table counts
- Outdoor court locations
- Weekly recurring schedule: regular club hours, ladder games, practice groups
- Tournament types and their typical time slots

Changes weekly or seasonally:
- News section
- Specific cancellations (marked with ❌)
- One-off tournament dates

## Schedule Structure

The schedule is organized by day of the week (Monday-Sunday). Each entry follows this format:
- Time. "Club Name". Event type. [Optional notes]

Event types:
- "Гра на столи" / "Ladder games" - Informal play where players rotate tables based on wins
- "Ігрова група" / "Practice group" - Regular practice sessions for a fixed group
- "Рейтинговий турнір X-Y" / "Ranked tournament X-Y" - Official tournament affecting UTTF rating, for players rated X to Y
- "Нерейтинговий турнір X-Y" / "Unranked tournament X-Y" - Casual tournament, no rating impact

Rating ranges (e.g., 0-25, 0-100) indicate which players can participate based on their UTTF (Ukrainian Table Tennis Federation) rating.

## Major Clubs

Orion - Largest club, 16 tables, multiple daily events, video streaming
Himars - 8 tables, air conditioning, backup power, bomb shelter
Воля (Volia) - Regular tournaments and ladder games
KUTT - 3 tables, daily evening sessions 18:30-22:00
Quiks - Multiple ranked tournaments weekly
Podacha#9 - 5 tables, ranked tournaments with stable prizes

## Outdoor Courts

The site lists public outdoor table tennis courts across Kyiv with locations and photos. Most are in parks: Hydropark, Holosiivskyi Park, Victory Park (Park Peremoha).

## Useful External Links

- UTTF (Ukrainian Table Tennis Federation): https://www.uttf.com.ua/
- UTTF Player Rankings: https://www.uttf.com.ua/ranking
- Kyiv Table Tennis Map: https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=13bpRNOQsdPBN7sjaGY6R7au66wjfH6ty
